actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to release a reversionary interest in certain lands in the Port of Benton, Washington, which were previously conveyed to the Port of Benton.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to release the reversionary interest of the United States in certain lands in the Port of Benton, Washington, on the condition that the Port of Benton donates the lands to Washington State University for the construction of a branch campus.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to release a reversionary interest in certain lands in the Port of Benton, Washington, which were previously conveyed to the Port of Benton.
